xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika » 13.15 Niyataduka, Kusalattika » 13.15.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
Niyataduka, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
94.
2575Niyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2576Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
95.
2577Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe…  pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
96.
2578Niyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2579Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
97.
2580Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2581Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte ekaṃ…pe…  nakamme dve…pe…  navippayutte ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)
98.
2582Niyato akusalo dhammo niyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
2583Aniyato akusalo dhammo aniyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
99.
2584Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā dve (niyate sahajātādhipati, dutiye ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati), anantare dve…pe…  nissaye dve, upanissaye tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
100.
2585Aniyataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2586Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
<< 13.15.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup13.16 Sauttaraduka, Kusalattika >>
